page.title: 08Homelife Housing
page.content: Our{Infants}sent 105 questionnaires to 1 home in each Mudeford street.80 were returned.Our findings were as follows: {Average Mudeford Home}has 2 adults, half a child and 0 babies.The oldest person is 57,youngest 35.Home is a house with 7 rooms(3 bedrooms,2 bath- rooms),5 trees,5 clocks,1 pet,1 music- al instrument,1 car,1 bicycle,2 tele- visions and 1 garage.{Favourites-} pastime-sport(21 homes),TV programme -documentary or soap opera(13 homes) holiday resort-in Britain(33 homes) food-roast(22 homes). {Children were surprised to find that in 20% of homes the youngest person is over retirement age, only 3 homes have babies, there are more bicycles than cars,people owned nearly as many boats and tents as videos,only three had beach huts.
